headlines.description: Alexandre Lacazette scored either side of Andre Schurrle's goal before Aaron Ramsey's backheel and Pierre-Emerick Aybameyang's late double.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal beat Fulham as Ramsey nets backheel

venue.fullName: The Friends Provident St Mary's Stadium

headlines.description: Eden Hazard, Ross Barkley and Alvaro Morata all scored for Chelsea in a 3-0 victory over Southampton.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hazard, Barkley, Morata on target in Chelsea win

headlines.description: Riyad Mahrez smashed a late penalty over the bar as this contest between two of Europe's most exciting sides surprisingly produced few chances.
headlines.shortLinkText: Mahrez skies late penalty in Liverpool-City draw
